p: The antibacterial potency of A. austro-iranicum, A. serotinum and A. chlorostegium methanol extracts was individually examined against 4 bacteria strains that were obtained from Iranian Biological Resource Center. Enterococcus faecalis (ATCC 29212) and Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25838) as Gram-positive strains and Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 27853) and Escherichia coliÂ (ATCC 11333) as Gram-negative strains, were tested in this study.
